title: Strengthening Learning Design Competencies: Online Community-Based Collaborative Learning Design for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can complete math curriculum designs by collaborating with peer teachers on online community platforms.
Learners can write self-reflection reports evaluating the quality of their contributions and behavioral patterns by analyzing community participation data.
Learners can improve draft instructional designs at least twice using feedback systems provided by the platform.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
